gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.jgraph
Class MiddlePanelJGraphController

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.jgraph.MiddlePanelJGraphController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MappingDataManager
public class MiddlePanelJGraphController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MappingDataManager

This is the controller class of Middle Panel JGraph implementation. The MiddlePanelJGraphController class will deal with real implementation of some of actions to modify (mainly CRUD) upon graph, and mainly focuses on drag-and-drop and handlings of repaint of graph, for example. MiddlePanelMarqueeHandler will help handle key and mouse driven events such as display pop menus, etc.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:03 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $

Field Detail

RCSID

public static java.lang.String RCSID
String that identifies the class version and solves the serial version UID problem. This String is for informational purposes only and MUST not be made final.

See Also:
JBuilder vice javac serial version UID
